description: Managerless Wigan produce some gritty defending to draw at fellow strugglers Mansfield.
title: Mansfield Town 0-0 Wigan Athletic
title_page: Mansfield Town 0-0 Wigan Athletic - BBC Sport
maintext:
Mansfield’s 1-0 win in their reverse meeting with Wigan in October ended a four-game losing run in the league to the Latics.
This is Wigan’s first league visit to Mansfield since a 2-1 win in January 2003. The Latics have won both of their last two such trips, more than their previous six prior (W1 D1 L4).
Mansfield have lost each of their last five home league games, only ever losing six in a row in the Football League in February 2008.
